tool.name: ValidateSamFile
tool.command:
##set the maximum number of open file to hard maximum or 4096 if on a mac (mac gives 'unlimited' as output of `ulimit -Hn` command
[ `ulimit -Hn` = unlimited ] && ulimit -Sn 4096 || ulimit -Sn `ulimit -Hn`
&&
##set up input files @symlink_element_identifier@ #set $reference_fasta_filename = "localref.fa"
#if str( $reference_source.reference_source_selector ) == "history": ln -s "${reference_source.ref_file}" "${reference_fasta_filename}" && #else: #set $reference_fasta_filename = str( $reference_source.ref_file.fields.path ) #end if
@java_options@
picard ValidateSamFile
INPUT='$escaped_element_identifier' OUTPUT="${outFile}" MODE="${mode}"
#if str( $ignore ) != "None": #for $element in str( $ignore ).split(','): ## See trello card https://trello.com/c/9nW02Zhd IGNORE="${element}" #end for #end if
MAX_OUTPUT="${max_output}" REFERENCE_SEQUENCE="${reference_fasta_filename}" IGNORE_WARNINGS="${ignore_warnings}" IS_BISULFITE_SEQUENCED="${is_bisulfite_sequenced}" MAX_OPEN_TEMP_FILES=`ulimit -Sn`
VERBOSITY=ERROR @TMPDIR_OPTION@ QUIET=true

param.name: inputFile
param.label: SAM/BAM dataset or dataset collection
param.help: If empty, upload or import a SAM/BAM dataset.

validator.message: A built-in dictionary is not available for the build associated with the selected input file

param.name: ref_file
param.label: Use the following dataset to create dictionary
param.help: You can upload a FASTA sequence to the history from which Picard will automatically generate dictionary using CreateSequenceDictionary command

param.name: ignore
param.label: Select validation error types to ignore

param.name: max_output
param.label: The maximum number of lines output in verbose mode

param.name: ignore_warnings
param.label: If true, only report errors and ignore warnings

param.name: validate_index
param.label: If true and input is a BAM file with an index file, also validates the index

param.name: is_bisulfite_sequenced
param.label: Whether the SAM or BAM file consists of bisulfite sequenced reads
param.help: IS_BISULFITE_SEQUENCED; If so, C->T is not counted as an error in computing the value of the NM tag; default=False
